en.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
en.faq.subtitle: We resolve the most common doubts
en.faq.q1: Do I need to make an appointment?
en.faq.a1: Yes, we recommend making an appointment to guarantee availability and the best service. You can book by calling the salon or using our online form.
en.faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
en.faq.a2: We accept cash, credit and debit cards, and bank transfers. We also offer payment plans for more expensive services.
en.faq.q3: Do you offer services for men?
en.faq.a3: Of course! We offer haircuts, facial treatments, manicure and pedicure specialized for men. We have stylists expert in men's cuts.
en.faq.a4: We use high-quality products from internationally recognized brands. All our products are professional and designed to provide the best results.
en.faq.q5: Can I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
en.faq.a5: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment at least 24 hours in advance. For last-minute cancellations, a fee may apply.
